name: Boat Fishing
description:
An amazing boat fish catching, shooting game with amazing features. You are a fisher, fish hunter in this game and needs to catch fish. Amazing colored sea environment, with beauty of nature, cool underwater graphics and interface.

If you really wana get fish hunting fun, with real, fish hunting games 2d then you are on right place. In this Boat Fishing, fish hunting, fish shooter, fish hunting game, games, you’ll act as a fisher and have a deep-ocean experience catching fishes and other sea creatures.

You can catch, shoot, hunt all the fishes available in the diameter just need to be clever and sharper to catch them. You just need to make a proper direction of shooting target, the far you pull the powerful the fish shoot. Increase your shooting skills with hunting, hunter game, fish hunter, fishing games for free.
publishers: BROBABIL IC VE DIS TICARET LTD STI
